name: Rafat
reviews: I love this laptop! Super easy set up, sleek, and apparently this brand has better functionality in some ways than other laptops. Still trying to learn how to use it but definitely worth the price.

name: Rohan
reviews: Perfect I absolutely love this computer. Super fast and easy.

name: Azrin
reviews: I would NOT recommend this product!!! We purchased this for my daughter's college classes... we have had it 2 months

name: Ahnaf
reviews: Asus Is not easy to use. It is very difficult to set up and change screens when I am using it and do not want to change screens. To others, DO NOT BUY ASUS. GET any other brand, it could only be as bad and not be any worse.

name: Arosh
reviews: Very unhappy with this laptop. Had to return it. The screen kept flashing black screen every so often and for a brand new laptop that was a concern. Also, I am a senior and don't have the best eyesight. It was a real struggle for me to read the keys.

name: Fabihan
reviews: Runs great, keyboard includes numerical, and charger is light and small. The device itself feels a bit heavy, but nothing too serious.
